item.title: 6 Most Surreal Video Games
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Spore offers a unique life simulation experience with strange creature evolution in colorful worlds.
  • Pools creates a dreamlike atmosphere with eerie vibes despite lacking traditional horror elements.
  • The Eternal Cylinder stands out with its unique survival gameplay, mutation mechanics, and colorful alien world.

In recent years, the video game industry has become a global entertainment juggernaut, producing games that appeal to mass audiences. However, some games strive to be different, pushing against the grain and creating wholly unique experiences. Often taking on a surreal or absurd form, these games can be labeled “weird” or “strange” but, in reality, are groundbreaking games that push the industry to new places.

While they may never experience the success of games such as Call of Duty , Minecraft , or Resident Evil , many have grown a dedicated cult following. Some are considered video game classics, while others are rising indie stars, all of which deserve a place in every gamer's library.

1 Spore

Create Life, But Not As We Know It

In this successful life-simulation game, players assume the role of a god, seeding a planet with simple single-celled life and watching as it grows. The game is broken up into different life stages, where the player develops their species into more complex creatures. This goes from the cell stage, where the simple life forms inhabit the ocean, all the way to the space stage, where the player has developed the species into an intelligent spacefaring race.

In the game, players can create some truly strange creatures, evolving them in weird and wonderful ways. The game style is vibrant and colorful and has a lot of replay value. Spore has become a cult classic with a dedicated fan base that still highly praises the game today. It also won several awards for its groundbreaking gameplay.

2 Pools

A Terrifying Dreamlike Atmosphere

  • Platform : Microsoft Windows, Linux, macOS, Mac Operating Systems
  • Released : 2023
  • Developers : Tensori
  • Genre : Adventure, Simulator
  • Steam Reviews : Very Positive

“Liminal Space” games have become a popular sub-genre in indie gaming, with Pools being one of the best available. Pools is a walking simulator game where the player traverses an empty building dripping with a strange, unsettling atmosphere. While Pools isn’t a traditional horror game, as it features no enemies, its echoing passages and shadowy corners create a nightmare world that feels off.

Nothing quite makes sense as players move through the game world. It invokes the feeling of loneliness or being lost like no other. The repeating theme of swimming pools with plain white tiled floors, walls, and ceilings gives the game a labyrinthine feel, like a vivid dream that doesn’t make sense.

3 The Eternal Cylinder

Escape, Mutate, And Survive

  • Platform : Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Series S, GeForce Now,
  • Released : 2021
  • Developers : ACE Team
  • Genre : Survival, Adventure
  • Steam Reviews : Very Positive

The Eternal Cylinder is a unique survival game where players take on the role of a Trebhum, a small, intelligent creature with the ability to mutate itself for different tasks. The game follows the creatures in their desperate struggle against the Eternal Cylinder, an unstoppable and colossal tube slowly destroying the planet.

Players must find other Trebhum on their journey, mutating them in different ways to progress further. Throughout the game, a voice narrates the story as it happens, giving the game a storybook feeling. The game world is both vibrant and alien, with strange and surreal monsters roaming the land. The Eternal Cylinder is like no other game around and a must-play for fans of indie titles.

4 Pathologic 2

A Dark and Twisted RPG

Pathologic 2 is a challenging survival RPG that is a part sequel and part remake of the 2005 cult classic Pathologic . Set in a remote Russian town, the player controls Artemy Burakh, a surgeon who returns to his hometown to find his father dead and a plague spreading through the population. Players have only 12 in-game days to solve the mystery of the plague while navigating the town's politics and problems.

During a playthrough, the player must constantly question what is real, as every character has a unique motivation. The game is played like a grand theatrical event, with a theater director often breaking the fourth wall by commenting on the player's progress. Pathologic 2 is a game designed to make the player uncomfortable and stressed, with characters and quests pulling in all directions. The game is a masterclass in atmosphere and a must-play experience for fans of the strange and disturbing.

5 The Stanley Parable

An Experimental Journey Through an Office

This story-driven game follows the strange story of Stanley, a seemingly ordinary man whose world starts to unravel. The game features a narrator who reacts to the player's choices as he tells Stanley’s story. The game is a surreal nightmare where the ordinary office setting features divergent paths and circular narratives that reset the game.

The Stanley Parable became a cult hit, with critics praising its genre-breaking narrative and emphasis on player choice. The reactive nature of the game opens new possibilities for immersive experiences, where the lines between the player, the developer, and the story blur.

6 Hylics 2

Surreal Turn-Based Combat

  • Platform : Microsoft Windows, macOS, Mac Operating Systems
  • Released : 2020
  • Developers : Mason Lindroth
  • Genre : Roleplaying Game
  • Steam Reviews : Overwhelmingly Positive

Hylics 2 is one of the most unique-looking games available. Highly influenced by surrealist artists such as Salvador Dalí, the game takes players on a journey through the absurd, with turn-based combat, 3D platforming, and even dungeon-crawler segments.

Players control Wayne as he builds his party and adventures through the world, defeating enemies and finding treasure. The visual style makes excellent use of claymation and stop-motion animation, creating a high-art surrealist style that is wholly unforgettable. The game received critical acclaim on release, with critics particularly praising its visuals and music.

item.title: CoD Black Ops 6 & Warzone: Best Tanto .22 Loadout
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Best Tanto .22 Loadout In Black Ops 6
    • Best Black Ops 6 Perks & Wildcard
    • Black Ops 6 Secondary Recommendations
  • Best Tanto .22 Loadout in Warzone
    • Best Warzone Perks & Wildcards
    • Warzone Secondary Recommendations

Black Ops 6 has finally made its debut, bringing a plethora of content for fans to dive into right from the start. While many may be eager to jump into Campaign and Zombies, the main attraction is, of course, Multiplayer. Players battling it out in Black Ops 6 Multiplayer might be on the lookout for a solid weapon to dominate their matches. Luckily, some players might not need to look further than the Tanto .22 Submachine Gun.

The Tanto .22 is a Submachine Gun that players can acquire early in Black Ops 6 & Warzone , unlockable at Level 16 . While it has a slower fire rate compared to others in its class, the Tanto .22 excels with its high damage-per-shot, along with boasting impressive range — making it a heavy hitter up close and even effective at medium range. These attributes make the Tanto .22 one of the best weapons in Black Ops 6 , especially when paired with the best loadout .

Updated on November 18, 2024, by Nathan Round: The integration of Black Ops 6 into Call of Duty: Warzone has shifted the game's meta, introducing a wide array of new weapons to choose from. As part of this update, we've added a new loadout recommendation specifically tailored for Warzone, focusing on an excellent, high TTK (time-to-kill) Tanto .22 build for maps like Area 99.

Best Tanto .22 Loadout In Black Ops 6

Best Tanto .22 Black Ops 6 Build:

  • Long Barrel (Barrel)
  • Ranger Foregrip (Underbarrel)
  • Extended Mag I (Magazine)
  • Commando Grip (Rear Grip)
  • Rapid Fire (Fire Mods)

The build showcased above is an excellent fit for players looking to stay fast and aggressive during their Multiplayer matches. While most players may opt to run eight attachments using the Gunfighter Wildcard, only five are essential. The attachment combinations listed above significantly boost the overall time-to-kill (TTK) of the Tanto .22 while also extending its effective damage range well into medium-range engagements. Additional benefits include improved horizontal recoil control , increased movement speed , and enhanced aim-down-sight (ADS) and sprint-to-fire speeds .

Best Black Ops 6 Perks & Wildcard

  • Dexterity (Perk 1)
  • Tracker (Perk 2)
  • Double Time (Perk 3)

  • Enforcer (Specialty)
  • Perk Greed (Wildcard)
  • Scavenger (Perk Greed)

There is a large roster of solid Perks in Black Ops 6 . Though players may initially be spoiled by choice, the Perk Package and Wildcard choice showcased below will serve players well in close-range engagements. Players running the package showcased above can expect to get some neat benefits, including reducing weapon motion whilst moving and being able to track enemy footprint trails .

Other neat benefits include an increased tactical sprint duration and the ability to resupply ammunition from fallen enemies — ensuring players are always well-equipped for the next gunfight.

Black Ops 6 Secondary Recommendations

The Tanto .22 will likely become the go-to weapon in most players' loadouts. However, equipping a reliable Handgun to cover close encounters or situations where reloading isn’t an option is always a smart choice. Black Ops 6 offers a well-rounded roster of Handguns, with the full-auto Grekhova standing out for its solid time-to-kill (TTK). Other strong options include the 9MM PM and GS45 , which offer excellent damage and reliable fire rates.

Best Tanto .22 Loadout in Warzone

  • Compensator (Muzzle)
  • Reinforced Barrel (Barrel)
  • Ranger Foregrip (Underbarrel)
  • Extended Mag I (Magazine)

  • Commando Grip (Rear Grip)
  • Balanced Stock (Stock)
  • Fast Motion Laser (Laser)
  • Rapid Fire (Fire Mods)

As far as the Tanto .22 goes, it's quite a solid weapon to use on maps like Area 99, thanks to its impressive handling and boasting one of the best range levels within the SMG category. However, with the build listed above, it becomes even better. Though five attachments are sufficient, players can utilize a trick to get two eight-attachment weapons via the Buy Station, maximizing the benefits of the Gunfighter Wildcard.

With the specified attachments, the recoil of the Tanto .22 is smoothed out , ensuring pinpoint accuracy at medium range. Similar to its Multiplayer counterpart, improvements to mobility, aim-down-sight speed, and sprint-to-fire speed have been added. Additionally, bullet velocity and damage range have been enhanced . To top off, this build features an increased fire rate for optimal TTK (time-to-kill).

Best Warzone Perks & Wildcards

  • Dexterity (Perk 1)
  • Sprinter (Perk 2)
  • Resolute (Perk 3)
  • Gunfighter (Wildcard)

Submachine Guns are best utilized with good mobility, allowing players to maintain a fast and aggressive playstyle during close-range encounters. This is where the Perk Package listed above comes in, ensuring players remain quick and agile regardless of the situation. The benefits of these Perks include reduced fall damage and unlimited Tactical Sprint . Additionally, players will receive movement speed boosts when taking damage , making it easier to escape from difficult scenarios.

As for the Wildcard, Gunfighter is an excellent choice, enabling the use of eight attachments . However, if players prefer not to scavenge for an extra weapon or purchase a custom build from the Buy Station, Overkill is also a solid alternative.

Warzone Secondary Recommendations

Finishing off this loadout is a reliable Secondary weapon. Whether players opt for Overkill or Gunfighter, acquiring an additional Primary Weapon is quite straightforward. The Tanto .22 serves as an excellent close-range choice, but for added versatility at longer ranges, players can consider weapons from the Assault Rifle or Light Machine Gun categories. In the current Warzone meta, solid Assault Rifle options include the Model L , the GPR 91 , and the Krig C . Meanwhile, the XMG is a great pick for those who prefer an LMG.

Another effective choice is a Sniper Rifle, particularly one capable of delivering one-shot headshots. At the moment, the best options are the LW3A1 Frostline and the LR 7.62 . The LW3A1 Frostline excels in speed and handling, while the LR 7.62 offers a higher damage output.

item.title: Roblox: Ultimate Football Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Football has always been popular in the gaming industry, with many fans enjoying their favorite game on the Roblox platform. The Ultimate Football developers have created a great game in which Roblox players have to try their best to win on the football field. To reward fans who enjoy the game, the developers also release Ultimate Football codes, all of which can be found below.

Updated November 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Check out the latest code added to this list. Don't forget to use it and other codes as soon as possible and improve your gaming experience.

Just like in many other Roblox games, the developers have added a huge number of codes, but most of them have already expired. Below is a list of all active codes, but they may also expire soon, so hurry up and get the rewards.

How to Redeem Codes in Ultimate Football

Similar to many Roblox games, the button to redeem codes can be found in the in-game menu. It is quite easy to find, and this is what players need to do:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Ultimate Football .
  2. Next, in the main menu, go to the Store tab.
  3. Go to the Redeem a Code section.
  4. Enter or paste the code in the Insert Code Here field and click on the tick. After that, the reward will be received.

Note that players who have just started playing the game will not be able to redeem codes. They must first spend 3 hours in Park Mode for this option to become available.

item.title: Roblox: Tower Defense RNG Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Tower Defense RNG Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Tower Defense RNG
  • How to Get More Tower Defense RNG Codes

Tower Defense RNG is an exciting multi-genre Roblox game where you will need to roll a dice that will determine which weapon you will receive to defend yourself against zombies. With the weapons you receive, you will need to build a defense line to repel waves of enemies.

To successfully resist the horde, you will need good weapons, which can be achieved by redeeming Tower Defense RNG codes. The rewards you receive will not supply you with weapons directly, but they will provide you with a decent amount of resources that will allow you to do so.

Updated November 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: With this update, we found one new code that you can redeem to get cool rewards. Keep this guide to have constant access to freebies.

All Tower Defense RNG Codes

Working Tower Defense RNG Codes

  • 5mYippie - Redeem this code to get 2 Ruby and 1 Onyx. (NEW)
  • likethegameforluck - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Expired Tower Defense RNG Codes

  • rubyforall - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • grindGRINDgrind - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • itsLuckingTime - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • REROLL - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • faze1M - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • 100K - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • test - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • release - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Redeeming Tower Defense RNG codes will be useful at any point of the game, regardless of whether you are a beginner or a veteran zombie killer. So, to make your survival easier, be sure to redeem Tower Defense RNG codes before they expire.

How to Redeem Codes for Tower Defense RNG

So, now that you know what rewards await you, it's time to learn how to get them. As with most other Roblox games, it will take you a few clicks, but if you don't know how to redeem Tower Defense RNG codes, here is a detailed guide:

  • Launch Tower Defense RNG .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. Among the other buttons and options here, interact with the one labeled Shop.
  • Once the new menu opens, scroll to the very bottom. Here you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field and a purple Redeem button next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the active codes mentioned above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the purple Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Tower Defense RNG Codes

If you're looking for more Tower Defense RNG codes, be sure to check out the game's official social media. Here, in the original sources, you can find Roblox codes among other content and news posted by the developers, so be sure to keep an eye on them:

  • Official Tower Defense RNG Roblox group.
  • Official Tower Defense RNG Discord server.
  • Official Tower Defense RNG X account.

item.title: Roblox: Stickman TD Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Stickman TD offers players a classic tower defense experience. But instead of towers, you have to use various stickmen. Each of them has different stats and abilities. But to summon new ones, you will need Stickman TD codes.

As with other Roblox experiences, codes give players various rewards. Often, these rewards will be quite large amounts of coin, but sometimes you can get rare units. However, codes remain active only for a limited time, so you should not delay using them.

Updated November 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: One new code was added this week, so you can redeem it to get 300 coins. Also, if you haven't redeemed the other codes yet, now is a very good opportunity.

All Stickman TD Codes

Working Stickman TD Codes

  • 18klike - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins (NEW)
  • wukong - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins
  • likeus - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • tower - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins
  • welcome - Redeem this code to get 200 Coins
  • super - Redeem this code to 200 Coins

Expired Stickman TD Codes

There are no expired codes in Stickman TD . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

One of the Stickman TD features is the variability of unit upgrades. During the battle, you not only increase the stats of the towers but also choose which build they will use. However, rarer stickmen still have more powerful abilities and stats. So be prepared to farm a lot of Coins for summoning. Fortunately, with the help of Stickman TD codes, you can quickly earn extra money.

Just a few of these codes will allow you to summon up to 10 units, even before you enter your first battle. So, if you are lucky, you can even replenish the collection with rare characters. But it is worth noting that after some time after the release, each code expires.

How to Redeem Stickman TD Codes

Using Stickman TD codes is as easy as in other TD Roblox experiences. This feature is available to players from the first minutes of the game, so you just need to follow these steps to redeem codes:

  • Launch Stickman TD .
  • After that, click on the Codes button. It is easy to spot by the gear icon on the right side of the screen.
  • Then, enter the code and click the Submit button to get your free goodies.

How to Get More Stickman TD Codes

These Roblox codes are a great source of free Coins, so you probably don't want to miss out on new ones. Therefore, you should start following the developers' social media to receive rewards as soon as they are released. There, players will be able to find all the news, discussions, updates, and codes:

  • Official Stickman TD Discord Server
  • Official SAND4 Roblox Group
